abstract: The company’s chief operating officer, James C. Smith, will become the new chief executive.
snippet: The company’s chief operating officer, James C. Smith, will become the new chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Thomson Reuters said Thursday that it was replacing its chief executive, Thomas H. Glocer, who had struggled to turn around the financial news and information service in an increasingly competitive market.

headline.main: Glocer, Chief Executive of Thomson Reuters, Is Being Replaced
